data.text: Jisu'n mipui ngaikha amuli chingtiang khan akaljei, halli in-ongnga ompha, Ama siamruoi ngai'n akoolla inlei-inchun,
halli ama'n inmani kha kaminchu aphut jei:
“Ratha ah kasuol kin-eii ti kajet ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Malung kapoong ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Malung kadai ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Chuon katuun sikbit ah wonchaam tuikaraal ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Minriang kajet ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Malung inthiang ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Hoina daina sik ah chuonkatho ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Chuonkatuun jarra inrachaak ngaikha rawaan intha;
“Kei jarra mi ngai'n nangni innaran khat-um innarachaak, halli nangni chungnga kathamak rakip innanoon jei inchu nangni ningrawaan atha.” 1 Pet 4:14
Hoiru khat-um rokru, ajarchu marwaanna nangnisik chuonthoman kalok kha inda, ajarchu nangni matiangnga leikaom Pathian chongkachoi ngaikha hinthoa inleirachaak. 2 Khang 36:16; Chuon 7:52

“Nangnichu nuoipilchung machi kha ning eii. Takkha machi khan al makjei inchu, khawa kha angtho-thoa nimin-al sik me? khawakha kalekjuonna mi ngai keiiya intou eleiya iteii um anemna ommakjei.” Mk 9:50; Luk 14:34,35
“Nangnichu nuoipilchung pumpui war kha ning eii. Chingnga insak khuopui kha thup thamak.” Jn 8:12; 9:5
Mi ngai'n sariakmei kha inminkaili kok nuoiya damu; khawa rathuulla sariakmei kechungnga indali, innsuungnga kaom mirakip munasik inminwar. Mk 4:21; Luk 8:16; 11:33
Kha angnga mi ngai'n nangni chountho katha kha inmuwa marwaanna kaom ning Pa kha minpaak nasik nangni war kha mi ngai maikuungnga warrase. 1 Pet 2:12
“Kei'n Moses Dan khat-um Pathian chongkachoi ngai chongkha kaminmang sik kijuo eii tia ngaidonmaru, keichu kaminmang kijuo emong, takkha khawa ngai huui kamintung kijuo eii.”

Ajarchu kei'n nangni diang inthiangnga kiril hi eii. Marwaan li nuoipil ahek maklaiseng, Dan chongramol kasiin khet emakli wiarkhat bit um hiwarakip atungmaklaiseng inmangnuni.5:18. Hiwarakip atungmaklaiseng; emakli hiwa minchuna rakip hi pui lahongtung sik eii  Luk 16:17

Khawa jarra, tuka-ang inkhat in chongpeii karra akasiin khet inkhat kha amakoiya mi ngaidiang khajek kha thoru tia aminchu inchu marwaan Rengramma akasiin khet esik eii, Inkhattiang, tuka-ang inkhat in Dan kha ajuiya mi ngaidiang aminchu inchu, amakha marwaan Rengramma akalok khet esik eii.
Ajarchu kei'n nangni diang kiril hi eii, nangni chuontho katuun kha Dan ocha ngai khat-um Pharisee ngai neek ah kheella ningthomak inchu, nangni marwaan Rengram supluut luut nutun.
“Mi ngai'n matiang khan inleiril kha nangni'n ningjetjei, ‘Mi thatmaru; tuka-ang inkhat in mi athat inchu achungnga chongtan kangar kha omsik eii.’ Suok 20:13; Innidan 5:17

Takkha tuun kei'n nangni diang kati: tuka-ang inkhat in ama unai ngaidiang araang inchu5:22. araang inchu; manuscript lekkhat achu ajar omleiya naraang inchu chongtan kangar amusik eii, halli tuka-ang inkhat in a-u anai ngaikha ‘Anemna kaboi nang!’ tia akoi inchu ama kha Katar ngai maikuungnga inkeisuosik eii, halli tuka-ang inkhat in ka-am anemna kaboi nang atia akoi inchu chikaom meikhurra achulsik eii.
Khawa jarra nang in Pathian diang maichaam khan kutchoi nape siktiang na-u nanai ngai'n nachungnga angmekhat hoimakna kaom kha nahong ngaidon inchu,
nakutchoi kha maichaam ma-khan da-inlang, woikhat kirnook inlang na-u nanai ngai khale juo-inzoot naru, halli heikir inlang Pathian diang nakutchoi kha jopero.”

“Nang inhalpui mi inkhat in nang chungnga zootmak ah chongtanna munna anaruoi inchu, lamma ningsi lai innot ah inzootnaru, kha emak inchu ni-inhalpui ama'n nangkha chongkatanpa diang khan napeta, halli chongkatanpa in nangkha mikhumna kangaak ngaidiang napeta nang mikhumna khan nadasik eii.”
Kei'n nang diang inthiangnga karil, nang in ahekna napesik kasuok sial kha nape maklaiseng khawa munna inphut heisuok thanunijei.
“Zool-inthai emaru, ‘inleiti kha nangni'n ningjetjei.’ Suok 20:14; Innidan 5:18
Takkha tuun kei'n nangni diang kati, numeisa inkhat kha taksa manuom nakhan ka-en mi rakip in ama malungnga ama khale inruoiya zool-inthai kha ejei.”

Halli namit changtiang khan nangkha manu ah anamachul sik e-inchu, kel-inlang kalekjuonro! ajarchu napumtak kha meikhurra kaminluut sikneek ah nataksa saram inkhat kamang khan nang sik ah athawiai. Matt 18:9; Mk 9:47

Nakut changtiang khan nangkha manu ah anamachulsik e-inchu, tan-inlang kalekjuonro! ajarchu napumtak kha meikhurra kaluutsik neek ah nataksa saram inkhat kamang khan nangsik ah athawiai. Matt 18:8; Mk 9:43
“Hiwahi inleiril jei, ‘tuka-ang in anumei inthenpui inchu, inthenpuina chongmajia kha numeisanu diangkhan perase.’ ” Levi 19:12; Teelna 30:2; Innidan 23:21

Takkha tuun kei'n nangni diang kati: zool-inthai jarra elekleiya, mi inkhat in anumei inthenpui ngai asuok ah halli anumei khan inn aneinook inchu ama'n anumei kha zool-inthai amin ejei, halli numeisanu kaneinook mi kha um zool-inthai amin ejei. Matt 19:9; Mk 10:11,12; Luk 16:18; 1 Cor 7:10,11

“Nangni'n, matiangnga mi ngai'n inleiril kha nangni'n ningjetjei, khachu ‘Nangni chong inkhitna kha makoi maru, takkha angme chongkhomaak ni-insaam kha Pumi diang khan thoro.’ Levi 19:12; Teelna 30:2; Innidan 23:21
Takkha kei'n nangni diang karil: Chong ning inkhit pha chongkhomaak insaam maru, marwaan rakook inlang khomaak insaam maru, ajarchu hiwahi Pathian in-ongna eii, Jam 5:12; Isa 66:1; Matt 23:22
emakli nuoipil rakook inlang-um khomaak insaam maru, ajarchu ama ke dana kha eii; emakli Jerusalem rakook inlang-um khomaak insaam maru, ajarchu akalok Reng khuopui kha eii. Isa 66:1; Minpkla 48:2
Nalu ma-ou inlang khomaak insaam maro, ajarchu nang in samramol inkhat bit um minbang kate emakli minwom kate nimator emak.
Hintiro ‘Oh’ natili ‘Oh’ tiro emakli ‘Ngang’ natili ‘Ngang’ tiro. hiwa chungtiang heikasuok ngaisengchu Kathamak Mipa makheiya aheikasuok eii.”
“Hinna inleiti kha nangni'n ningjet, ‘Mit inkhat sik ah mit inkhat, ha inkhat sik ah ha inkhat.’ ” Suok 21:24; Levi 24:20; Innidan 19:21
Takkha kei'n nangni diang kati, nangni'n akathamak mi kha phaphu luok maru. Tuka-ang inkhat in nangem changtiang kabeen inchu, nangem kaangkhat tiang um doupiro.
Halli tuka-ang inkhat in nang kha chongtanna khan anaruoiya nasongkol aleizoot ah chongkal inchu, ama diang khan napuonsil kha um leirase.
Khat-um tuka-ang rup inkhat in aphur kha nazootmak pumma mile inkhat naminchoi inchu, mile inni choipiro.
Tuka-ang inkhat in nang diang phur khat anani pha, ama diang khan pero, halli tuka-ang inkhat in phur khat apuukzoot pha, ama diang khan minpuuk ro.
“Hinna inleiti kha nangni'n ningjet, ‘Na-indiang na-inwaipui ngaikha minriangro, ni-inhalpui ngaikha matirro.’ ”
Takkha tuun nangni diang kei'n kati: nangni inhalpui ngaikha minriangro, khat-um nangni kanaminpoong ngai sikbit ah nina neipiru,
Kha angnga marwaanna kaom ning Pa sangai kha ning esik eii, ajarchu ama'n akase li akatha ngai chungnga in-angnga ama'n kani aminsuok, halli mi katha li mi kathamak ngai sik um ruo aminsur.
Ajarchu nangni'n nangni kanaminriang mi ngaibit ningminriang inchu Pathian in nangni diang angtho-thoa thoman anapesik me? rampar kakhoom ngai innum khan intho emak abe!
Khat-um nangni'n ning-u ningnai ngaidiang bit khoya ningtho inchu, mi ngai diangnga nangni'n ang kakheel ningthome? zaatlop ngai innum khan intho emak abe!
Khawa jarra Marwaanna kaom ning Pa in pui itung angnga Nangni um puikatung kha eru. Levi 19:2; Innidan 18:13
